home.hero_title: Outsource your B2B prospecting. Focus on closing.
home.hero_subtitle: NLG Consulting delivers 15–20 qualified meetings per month via multichannel outreach (LinkedIn, email, phone).
home.step1_desc: We work with you to identify your ideal customer profile and target market.
home.step2_desc: Our team executes personalized campaigns across LinkedIn, email, and phone.
home.step3_desc: Get 15–20 qualified appointments per month, ready for your sales team to close.
home.testimonial1: NLG Consulting transformed our lead generation. We now have a consistent pipeline of qualified meetings.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive B2B lead generation and appointment setting solutions
services.linkedin_desc: Personalized connection sequences with safe engagement limits to protect your reputation.
services.email_desc: Professional warm-up, domain health management, and smart sequencing for maximum deliverability.
services.calling_desc: Professional appointment setting with trained SDRs who understand your value proposition.
services.copywriting_desc: Messaging strategy and compelling copy that resonates with your target audience.
services.b2c_note: While we specialize in B2B lead generation, our team can also design and run high-performance B2C campaigns focused on conversion and ROI.

about.title: About NLG Consulting
about.subtitle: European B2B sales outsourcing expertise
about.bio_text: Entrepreneur with deep expertise in business development and SaaS B2B sales. Specialized in FR/BE/CH/CA markets with EU-wide delivery capabilities.
about.mission_text: To help European businesses scale their sales by providing qualified meetings through proven multichannel prospecting strategies.
about.method_text: We combine data-driven targeting, personalized messaging, and persistent follow-up across LinkedIn, email, and phone to deliver consistent results.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch to discuss your sales outsourcing needs
contact.form_consent: I consent to processing of my personal data for the purpose of responding to my inquiry, as described in the Privacy Policy.
contact.success_message: We've received your message and will get back to you within 24 hours.

book.title: Book Your Free Consultation
book.subtitle: Schedule a 15-minute call to discuss how we can help you generate qualified B2B meetings
